```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
set.seed(666)

noise <- rnorm(1000, 0, 1)

t = 1
Z <- noise[t]

t = 2
Z[t] <- .3*Z[t-1] + noise[t]

for (t in 3:length(noise)) {
  Z[t] <- .3*Z[t-1] - .585*Z[t-2] + noise[t]
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
par(mfrow=c(3,1))
ts.plot(Z)
acf(Z, type = "correlation", plot = T, main = "ACF")
acf(Z, type = "partial", plot = T, main = "PACF")
```
